original_text: But what I tell you is this: A man may look at a woman who is not his wife. And he may want to have sex with her. In his thoughts, he has had sex with her, so he has done a wrong thing.
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 음욕을 품고 여자를 보는 자마다 마음에 이미 간음하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But what I tell you is this:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 너희에게 말하는 것은 이것이다:

sentences.original_text: A man may look at a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 여자를 볼 수 있다

sentences.original_text: And he may want to have sex with her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그녀와 성관계를 갖고 싶어할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: In his thoughts, he has had sex with her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 생각 속에서, 그는 그녀와 성관계를 한 것이니

sentences.original_text: so he has done a wrong thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 잘못된 일을 한 것이다
